p.k: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky
51% Full-throttle thriller about a team of hackers using a devastating hurricane as cover to steal millions. Sky Cinema Original Film from Rob Cohen
59% Eccentric billionaire Richard E Grant forces suave cat burglar Bruce Willis to steal Leonardo Da Vinci's most valuable works. Barmy comedy caper
John Cusack battles to save his family as the end of the world closes in. Disaster epic from director Roland Emmerich, with Danny Glover
61% John Travolta stars as a renegade pilot who steals two nuclear warheads, but former partner Christian Slater is on his trail
62% Moving to China, young Jaden Smith is bullied by local kids, until martial arts master Jackie Chan teaches him to fight back. Family action remake
57% An ex-soldier (Dave Bautista) is forced into action when terrorists take control of a football stadium. Sky Cinema Original Film with Pierce Brosnan
John Cusack battles to save his family as the end of the world closes in. Disaster epic from director Roland Emmerich, with Danny Glover
69% Wise-cracking Miami cops Will Smith and Martin Lawrence fight to protect a witness and bring down a heroin crook. Action comedy
